# Highland Networks 
# Dynamically re-engineering web solutions

View all our bare metal offerings at:
[https://www.highland-networks.com/bare-metal](https://www.highland-networks.com/bare-metal "https://www.highland-networks.com/bare-metal")

We're offering some spookily good deals to celebrate October, with bare metal from $30 monthly and VPS from $36/year!  🎃 👻
<hr>
Why choose us? 
- 200GBPS Premium blend of AT&T, Windstream, Level 3, and Charter
- We own all our equipment, servers, firewalls, and routers.
- Up To 1TBPS Network Edge DDoS Protection
- Highly Secure PCI DSS and HIPAA compliant Facility
- Fully Managed support options.
- One-time application installations
- Custom configurations available (If you're looking for something special, reach out and we can make a deal)

What Comes Standard with every server: 
-    50TB @ 1GBPS of our Premium Network Blend
-    200GBPS DDOS Protection
-    Proactive Hardware Monitoring 
-    /30 IPv4 (1 Usable address)
-    24x7 Reloads and reboots
<hr>

**Dell Poweredge Dual X5650 RTO Special**
-    Dual Intel Xeon X5650 (12 cores, 24 threads)
-    64GB DDR3 ECC Memory
-    2 x 240GB SATA SSD
-    50TB on 1 GBPS Port
-    /30 IPV4
$59 monthly – [Order here!](https://portal.highland-networks.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=7 "Order here!")
**PROMO: $200 setup fee brings monthly cost to $35 for 1 year AND doubles bandwidth to 100TB. After one year, you own the hardware and you can colocate with us for $29 per month, or have the server shipped to you.**
Additional Upgrades 

/29 IPV4  - $5 / month
100TB Extra Traffic - $40
Upgrade to 1gbps Unmetered - $300

Management Options 
-    Reactive Management - $25 / monthly (Proactive Monitoring for up to 10 ports or at the OS level via our agent, patching upon request, limited admin assistance upon request) 
-    Proactive Management - $45 / monthly (Includes Directadmin license, Patching, software installs, 2 admin hours per month, and proactive monitoring for up to 50 ports. )
 <hr>

**All our VPS offerings are currently 10% off (recurring) with promo code SCARYGOODTIME, valid until the 20th of October. 
We’re also offering a FREE 100GB of block storage with each VM, just comment your order number along with SPOOKYSTORAGE below!**

1 vCore @ 2.5ghz** (E5-2680v3 or better)
1GB DDR4 ECC Memory
20GB RAID-10 Enterprise SSD
10TB Premium Traffic
$36 a year with code SCARYGOODTIME! [Order here!](https://portal.highland-networks.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=6&promocode=SCARYGOODTIME "Order here!")


1 vCore @ 2.5ghz** (E5-2680v3 or better)
2GB DDR4 ECC Memory
40GB RAID-10 Enterprise SSD
10TB Bandwidth
$65 a year with code SCARYGOODTIME! [Order here!](https://portal.highland-networks.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2&promocode=SCARYGOODTIME "Order here!")



**Payment Methods**
- Credit Card
- Paypal

<hr> 

**Datacenter**

Tier 3 Facility located in Charlotte, North Carolina.
